summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Allo PC Dépannage website - professional IT repair service site with SEO location pages. Backend APIs and frontend UI/UX functioning excellently with minor issues identified.

minor_issues.issue: Some location SEO meta titles mention only 'PC' but not 'Mac' (e.g. 'Dépannage PC Paris 16') while frontend content properly includes both
minor_issues.impact: SEO titles could be more comprehensive for Mac repair services

design_issues.issue: React hydration warning in console about span elements in select/option structure
design_issues.impact: Console warning only, no functional impact

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all required sections (Hero, Services, Advantages, Zones, Testimonials, FAQ, CTA)
Navigation with original allopcdepannage.fr logo working
All 5 SEO location pages load correctly with PC & Mac mentions
Location dropdown shows all areas (Paris 16/17/8, Neuilly, Levallois)
Contact form submission and validation working perfectly
Backend API endpoints (health, locations, services, contact) all functional
Mobile responsiveness and sticky call bar working
Phone and email CTA links functional
PC & Mac mentions throughout site (31 PC + 32 Mac mentions on homepage)
